SEARCH
Package org.apache.calcite.adapter.jdbc

Class JdbcRules

java.lang.Object
org.apache.calcite.adapter.jdbc.JdbcRules
public class JdbcRules extends Object
Rules and relational operators for JdbcConvention calling convention.
